item.title: Temple of the Winds (Sword of Truth series, Book 4) by Terry Goodkind
item.description: I must admit I wasn’t very impressed when I started reading the 1st book of the series. In Wizard’s First Rule, Goodkind’s writing just didn’t seem to possess a certain sophistication and polish, and at times it had such a wooden quality that I found myself squirming. Now after having read through the 5th book of the series, I’m glad I’ve stuck around! As the tale progresses, so does the author’s mastery of his craft.
